Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 84th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1974...
Injured on 4/1/1975 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 5/1/1977 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/30/1977 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Injured on 6/5/1978 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/27/1980, off Gayle Wenzel (DIA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1980, off Mike Roleke (WT)...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/1/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $663,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/14/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Manchester on 6/13/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/13/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $463,300 per year...
